mosinstall.name: MosCmenuTree
mosinstall.author: Chanh Ong
mosinstall.description:
Content Menu Tree, (see readme.txt for more detail), created by Chanh Ong

Support COAddOns in making a small donation!

param.name: encoding
param.label: Language Encoding
param.description: Language Encoding ex: UTF-8, ISO-8859-1, etc

param.name: shownew
param.label: Show New
param.description: Option to show new or update image on menu item.

param.name: secid
param.label: Sect ID
param.description: Section ID ex: 1,2

param.name: catid
param.label: Cat ID
param.description: Category ID ex: 1,2

param.name: showCatid
param.label: Show Catid
param.description: Option to show or hide catid on URL.

param.name: showArrow
param.label: Show Arrow
param.description: Option to show arrow image on menu item.

param.name: useCSS
param.label: Use CSS
param.description: Option to use CSS of respective menu type which will use your site default template CSS.

param.name: ltype
param.label: Menu Type
param.description: Display content using menu of your chosen

param.name: secorderby
param.label: Section Order by
param.description: Section Order by (Excluding Jcook and dTree)

param.name: catorderby
param.label: Category Order by
param.description: Category Order by

param.name: articlesorderby
param.label: Articles Order by
param.description: Articles Order by

param.name: showupdated
param.label: Show Updated
param.description: Show Updated Article Within number of days. Ex: 14

param.name: maxlength
param.label: Max Length
param.description: Maximum length to show the title ex: 20

param.name: @spacer
param.label: >>> [ByCatJ]
param.description: ByCatJ Menu Setting

param.name: showitem
param.label: Show Menu Items
param.description: Number of Menu Items to show ex: 2

param.name: @spacer
param.label: >>> [Tree]
param.description: Tree Menu Setting

param.name: moduleid
param.label: Module ID
param.description: MosCmenuTree unique ID ex: 1

param.name: basetext
param.label: Base Text
param.description: If Base=text, specify the text to use

param.name: openAll
param.label: Open All
param.description: By default a menu tree is shown with all folders closed, except the one of the selected node. With this parameter all folders are open. Overrides closeSameLevel

param.name: useSelection
param.label: Use Selection
param.description: Nodes can be selected(highlighted).

param.name: useLines
param.label: Use Lines
param.description: Tree is drawn with lines.

param.name: useIcons
param.label: Use Icons
param.description: Tree is drawn with icons.

param.name: useStatusText
param.label: Use Status Text
param.description: Displays node names in the statusbar instead of the url.

param.name: closeSameLevel
param.label: Close Same Level
param.description: Only one node within a parent can be expanded at the same time.

param.name: @spacer
param.label: >>> [JSCook]
param.description: JSCook Menu Setting

param.name: jscookmenutype
param.label: JSCook menu Type
param.description: Display menu orientation

param.name: jscookthemefile
param.label: Theme JS
param.description: Theme file to use. %LS% = livesite url, %MOD% = module path, %TEM% = template

param.name: @spacer
param.label: >>> Debug
param.description: Debug Setting

param.name: debug
param.label: Debug On/Off
param.description: Use this to turn debug On/Off
